body_html:
Hi @karmel, thank you for looking into this.

Since the way I am exporting my SavedModel is using Estimator API, to isolate the error I am facing, I would simply extend the TensorFlow's RNN for Drawing Classification tutorial by adding SavedModel functionality to it. I have put the code and documented the steps to reproduce the error in a small repo here.

Thanks!
body_text:
Hi @karmel, thank you for looking into this.
Since the way I am exporting my SavedModel is using Estimator API, to isolate the error I am facing, I would simply extend the TensorFlow's RNN for Drawing Classification tutorial by adding SavedModel functionality to it. I have put the code and documented the steps to reproduce the error in a small repo here.
Thanks!
body:
Hi @karmel, thank you for looking into this. 

Since the way I am exporting my SavedModel is [using Estimator API](https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/saved_model#using_savedmodel_with_estimators), to isolate the error I am facing, I would simply extend the TensorFlow's [RNN for Drawing Classification](https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/sequences/recurrent_quickdraw) tutorial by adding SavedModel functionality to it. I have put the code and documented the steps to reproduce the error in a small repo [here](https://github.com/aroraakshit/cast_issue_poc_). 

Thanks!
